sentences.en: He has said legal aid work is for juniors when they start out in the law.
sentences.cn: 他曾说过，法律援助工作适合初涉法律工作的低级别律师来做。

sentences.en: He should have been aware of what his junior officers were doing.
sentences.cn: 他本应该清楚自己下级们的所作所为。

sentences.en: He was the most junior and most recent arrival at the embassy.
sentences.cn: 在大使馆里，他是职位最低也是入职最晚的一位。

sentences.en: His son, Arthur Ochs Junior, is expected to succeed him as publisher.
sentences.cn: 他的儿子，小阿瑟·奥克斯，有望子承父业继续从事出版。

sentences.en: I loved horses as a child and was a junior show jumper.
sentences.cn: 我从小就爱马，曾是一名青少年马术障碍赛选手。

sentences.en: I was a naval officer, lieutenant junior grade.
sentences.cn: 我是一名海军中尉军官。

sentences.en: Mary, a junior, will graduate next year.
sentences.cn: 玛丽, 一名三年级的中学生, 明年将毕业.

sentences.en: Our doctor diagnosed a throat infection and prescribed antibiotic and junior aspirin.
sentences.cn: 我们的医生诊断是喉部感染，并且开了一些抗生素和小剂量阿司匹林。

sentences.en: Secondary school means junior school and high school.
She is my junior by three years.
She married a man seven years her junior.
sentences.cn: 她嫁给了一个比她小七岁的男人。

sentences.en: She now lives with actor Denis Lawson, 10 years her junior.
sentences.cn: 她现在与比她小10岁的演员丹尼斯·劳森同居。

sentences.en: Staff turnover is particularly high among junior grades.
sentences.cn: 基层职员的流动率特别高。

sentences.en: The most junior executive officer outranked the senior engineer officer aboard ship.
sentences.cn: 在舰船上，级别最低的副舰长也位列级别最高的轮机官之上。

sentences.en: The vacant W.B.C. junior-lightweight title has been called off.
sentences.cn: 空缺的世界拳击理事会次轻量级头衔被取消了。

sentences.en: We could give the job to somebody junior.
sentences.cn: 我们可以把这份工作交给职位较低的人.

phrases.tran_cn: 初级会计师；助理会计员
n. 低级文员，低级职员
n. 两年制专科学校，大专
初级人员；资历较浅的员工；基层员工
超级少年（韩国超人气组合）

trans.tran_cn: 职位较低的，青少年的，三年级的
trans.tran_en: relating to sport for young people below a particular age

trans.tran_cn: 职位较低者，青少年，小学生，较年幼者，（高中或大学的）三年级学生
trans.tran_en: a child who goes to a junior school
